name: Hattan
description: '''[[Malay styles and titles#Honorary styles|YHmt]] [[Dato']] [[Malay styles and titles#Other titles|Hj.]] Mohd Shukri bin Shahabudin''', known professionally as  '''Hattan''', is a Malaysian singer-songwriter, musician and actor. The song "Memburu Rindu", composed by [[M. Nasir]], made Hattan a popular solo singer in early 1991.
